{{dcl|
template&lt; class R &gt;
void swap( std::experimental::promise&lt;R&gt; &amp;lhs,
           std::experimental::promise&lt;R&gt; &amp;rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Overloads the {{tt|swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::experimental::promise}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|promises whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
